alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 19 at 4:56AM CST until January 20 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Victoria, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces, Inland San Patricio, Inland Refugio and Inland Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 7 AM CST this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
